KPIDefinition.Description: The utilization efficiency is the ratio between the actual production time (APT) and the actual unit busy time (AUBT).
KPIDefinition.Name: Utilization Efficiency
KPIDefinition.Formula: Utilization Efficiency = Actual Production Time/Actual Unit Busy Time
KPIDefinition.Notes: ”This indicator identifies the productivit y of work units. Because only the production time affects an added value which will be paid by the market, the goal should be to get a high indicator value.”
